title: Reza Moghadam: Emerging-Market Economies Prepare for COVID-19
description: Emerging markets recovered quickly from the 2008 financial crisis, but could a more challenging backdrop in 2020 mean a different outcome this time? Insights from Chief Economic Adviser Reza Moghadam.
